<Text: United States military jury:  Accused persons facing general or special courts-martial receive representation free of charge from Judge Advocates acting as defense counsel.>

Text: United States military jury:  While not required by Congressional law, service policy provides that many military accused receive the benefit of representation from a Judge Advocate defense counsel free of charge at summary courts-martial as well.
